place_description: Welcome to Coffee Republic Matthews, your go-to coffee shop since 2019! We serve roasted coffee, handcrafted drinks, and fresh bakery treats in a cozy shop. As passionate coffee roasters, we bring you the finest brews to fuel your day. Stop by today!

reviews_data.review_text: Great Coffee

Coffee is great and they have such fun lattes! I also loveee their peanut butter protein bites, so good! Everyone I have met has been so kind and nice, especially the lead manager. He is always there when I go in and he always makes sure I love what I have gotten! Highly recommend!

Nothing special. Low selection of pastries (it was still early in the morning) and it took a while to get out coffee drinks. It's an inviting place, but lacks enough seating. Maybe this is more of a to-go place for coffee!? It was a big rave over an average place. Drive a half hour to try this place. I would come again only if in the area.

Excellent location
Great coffee
Love the seating layout

That French toast muffin is crazy good!! I also really loved my latte as well. Isaiah was very kind and provided great service. When my food was ready, he brought it over to me with some napkins which was very thoughtful. I'll definitely be back again soon!! Cool atmosphere and peaceful music.

Their coffee is incredibly overpriced for the taste.  Been 3 times and each time it's tasted burnt or overbrewed. Not my favorite to pay $8+ for a coffee for it to be disgusting. And the last time I went, the gentleman working there acted like my 5 year old ordering for herself was an inconvenience. I won't be going back for multiple reasons.
Amazing service and excellent coffee
Great coffee place.
Amazing staff ,great coffee and just a walk away from the thrift all a girl could ever ask for
They forgot to brew my coffee being busy chatting with each other other. Tables are dirty, macaroon was served in the cup, what? And yes, coffee is nasty and serving in the paper cup for dine in.
Good coffee and cozy atmosphere.
The coffee was delicious and so were the pastries and you get all that with friendly service which is hard to come by these days.

I first tried this place when they just opened and got a latte. It was terrible. I figured they were still getting the hang of things, so I gave it another shot a couple of weeks later. Nope.. still bad.
Today I decided to try one last time instead of going to starbucks, thinking Third time's a charm. But it was just as bad as the first two times. I honestly don't understand where all these amazing reviews are coming from. I'm definitely disappointed and won't be coming back.
Their drip coffee is good. Appears to be popular with the locals.
This cafe is a breath of fresh air! Their attention to sustainability and community involvement is inspiring. The coffee is amazing, and the relaxed vibe makes it a great escape from the daily grind
Coffee Republic is a must-visit! Their seasonal drinks are always creative and delicious. Plus, the cozy atmosphere and friendly baristas make it feel like home. I've never had a bad experience here
Highly recommended! Overall Service and prices are great. The employees were friendly. When you go, try their dirty chai tea and Chile verde breakfast burrito!

I'm so glad I stumbled upon this place! The attention to detail in every cup of coffee is impressive. The cafe's interior is inviting, with comfortable spaces to relax or catch up with friends. A must-visit for coffee lovers

I can't recommend Coffee Republic Matthews enough! The ambiance is perfect for relaxing or being productive, and the coffee is consistently top-notch. They have a fantastic selection of pastries that pair perfectly with their brews. Whether I'm stopping in for a quick coffee or settling down for a while, I always leave happy.

Hands down the best coffee shop in Matthews! The vibe is welcoming, the staff is knowledgeable, and the coffee is consistently excellent. Their pastries are delicious too -- perfect for pairing with a freshly brewed cappuccino

Coffee Republic never disappoints! Whether you're in the mood for a classic espresso or a creative seasonal drink, they've got it covered. The cozy atmosphere makes it a wonderful escape from the hustle and bustle

The perfect blend of community and coffee! The baristas here are skilled and passionate, which shows in the quality of every drink. The Nutty Truffle is my favorite -- rich, creamy, and just the right amount of sweetness
Wonderful coffee, wonderful service!
Highly recommended!
Some of the best customer service I've experienced. This place is a must go!!!
This spot is top notch!  It's my go-to when traveling for work, and I stop by every time.  Staff is super friendly and coffee is AMAZING.  Highly recommend!
Amazing service, food and the environment is great.
Great!
Great experience! Friendly staff and worth the money .

Been here 4 times now. Started with a standard Latte which was weak, tried again and it was the same. Decided to give them a third chance and went to drip coffee. Was pretty much water and couldn't add any cream or it would be over creamed. Tried one more time and I'm throwing in the towel. On my 3rd and 4th visits there was a very nice batista too bad it didn't match coffee quality.

Great coffee, great atmosphere, and even better service! I love starting my mornings here. The cozy decor and ample seating make it a wonderful spot for early morning work sessions or just enjoying a peaceful cup of coffee.

Y'all, I have to say it is very often that I give a place one star. I would have gone back to have them make this right... But I was already halfway down the road... This was the worst coffee I have ever had in my life, and I don't even consider myself a coffee snob.

I thought that I would check them out, first timer here. I had cold brew with oat milk... It tasted disgusting... I actually have to admit that I would've rather have just gone to the big box store coffee shop that's on every corner, but I love to support local.  So disappointing, unfortunately

Coffee Republic is a must-try for any coffee lover. The staff truly knows how to make you feel welcome, and their fresh brews are unmatched. For me, the Nutty Truffle with Oat Milk changed everything.

I order coffee here through the app nearly every day. 90% of the time my coffee is made until I arrive and often times after customers who arrive after me. A newer hire doesn't greet you and does not speak up when conversing with you. They also struggled getting another customers order ahead of time and resulted in waiting an additional 15-20 minutes. Keep in mind I order through the app 15-20, sometimes 30 minutes in advance. I sent the feedback through their site before, there was no change, have now left a review. Going to seek somewhere else to get my coffee.

Absolutely love this place! The coffee is rich and flavorful, with a perfect balance of strength and smoothness. The atmosphere is cozy, making it an ideal spot to relax or get some work done. Highly recommend their lattes -- always brewed to perfection!

I was optimistic about this place but after trying it, am so disappointed that it has new ownership and is nothing like the previous shop! The interior is modern, but lacks the cozy vibe that Dilworth had. The most upsetting part was the sticker shock of ordering a tiny piece of quiche only to realize it was almost $9- tasted good but that price is insane!! Before leaving a review I wanted to also try coffee-- so I ordered a latte, and again faced the insanity of overcharging-- oat milk costs an additional $1.35- $8 for a latte with no flavoring/syrup. The coffee wasn't bad but wasn't great by any means-- espresso tasted burnt. The barista was nice but there's obviously poor management going on as it's Veterans Day and witnessed a vet come in for a free drip coffee (as posted on Instagram) and was told that the store wasn't offering it. He left visibly upset. Certainly will not be returning and will be continuing to grieve the loss of Dilworth coffee!!
Ana was amazing when my friend and I came late, she was so nice and attentive and made amazing coffee! You guys should check them out!

I absolutely adore Coffee Republic Matthews! It's not just a cafe; it's a community gathering place where everyone feels welcome. The staff greets you like an old friend, and their passion for coffee is evident in every cup. The menu features a variety of unique blends that never fail to impress. Plus, the comfortable seating and charming decor create the perfect ambiance for relaxation or productivity. I always leave with a smile

Every visit to Coffee Republic Matthews feels like a special occasion. The moment I walk in, I'm greeted by friendly faces and the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee. Their unique blends never fail to impress, making each sip an adventure. It's a delightful spot to catch up with friends or enjoy some quiet time alone
Coffee Republic Matthews is a fantastic spot for coffee lovers. The baristas are skilled, the atmosphere is inviting, and the coffee is always fresh and flavorful. A must-visit in the area!

I went to Coffee Republic for the first time with a friend and now I am hooked. I went back within 2 days. The coffee is smooth, bold and a little nutty in flavor. Best cup of coffee I have had in years! I will not go back to Starbucks as long as I am close to a Coffee Republic.  The want to try the Ballantyne location next, it appears larger and more space and I need to try a pastry too.
Personally the food items were overpriced for pre packaged frozen breakfast sandwiches. The chai latte was delicious ! But almost $9 for a singular spinach pastry is airport price to me
Stopped by for my first time this week!  Had a delicious vegan brownie bar and an iced vanilla latte with soy milk!  Both were so good!  So glad to have them here!
Coffee Republic Georgetown has it all--great coffee, friendly staff, and a relaxing environment. Whether I need a quick espresso or a place to unwind, it's always the perfect choice

Coffee Republic Georgetown is my go-to cafe for a reason! The coffee is expertly crafted, with each cup showcasing rich flavors that are hard to find elsewhere. The cozy atmosphere invites you to linger a little longer, whether you're working or catching up with friends. The staff always makes you feel at home
Love the coffee but unfortunately will not visit this location again. One employee during morning rush is complete insanity Paid and couldn't wait any longer took and took a raincheck.
Coffee Republic in Matthews is a gem. The coffee is always delicious, and the staff is incredibly welcoming. A great place to stop by for a high-quality coffee experience

I've given this place so many chances and they're just so unprofessional with the absolute worse customer service. There's no sense of urgency no matter how many people are in line and I will never return. The coffee isn't good enough to ruin my day.

Pleasant service. Hot latte had nice foam but coffee flavor was weak for my taste. Bacon, egg and cheese burrito was on some kind of flakey wrap with a crust rather than a tortilla and the contents were
tasteless.
Great experience. They had a no-show, so the VP and Director were running the place this morning. Very knowledgeable and provided great conversation.

This is nothing compared to the coffee shop here before, Dilworth Coffee. Dilworth Coffee had amazing coffee, quality service, and a community atmosphere. My wife and I came here every Saturday and always met someone new and had the best experience. This new coffee shop is disappointing and can't live up to its predecessor.

Service was terrible. Person taking my order had no customer service skills and was rude. Coffee was bad. Waste of 8$. People were kind at Dilworth Coffee and atmosphere was better. Won't be returning.

This was my first time at any Coffee Republic. They made a significant improvement to the interior. This space used to be Dilworth Coffee. It feels more open now. The French toast muffin was delicious! The iced caramel latte was pretty good. My bar on coffee/caramel lattes will always be Not Just Coffee. The service was excellent when I was there. They only had one barista working, and it was pretty busy. She did a fantastic job managing all of the customers. They probably need two baristas on staff for the morning. Overall, Coffee Republic is an improvement over Dillworth Coffee, and I will be back!
Coffee Republic is consistently excellent. The coffee is top-quality, the staff is friendly, and the ambiance is perfect for any time of day. Highly recommend
It took 30 minutes for 2 pour overs, the water wasn't hot..also weird, hipster pictures. Strange atmosphere that seems meant for uptown.
Good coffee but slow service(of course one person can't make so many orders at the same time so it makes sense).
Coffee Republic offers a delightful coffee experience. The variety of options and the welcoming environment make it an ideal spot to enjoy your favorite drink
I LOVE this place and ESPECIALLY enjoyed Trevor, my new favorite barista! He took his time allowing me to explore and helped me find the coffee of my dreams!

This is certainly not the coffee, service or atmosphere Im looking for especially first thing in the morning.  Nothing but a corporation vibe with the electronic boards, horrible seating and bad customer service.  Plus, don't get me started on the "fresh" pastries and the horrible prices.  If you want a nice neighborhood coffee house you will need to look elsewhere.
The coffee has been perfect every time! Hands down my favorite local coffee spot!

While I like the coffee shop itself the baristas were arguing and criticizing each other during my 15 minutes in the shop. Also one of the baristas had a crop top on. While this in a general setting doesn't bother me, when handling food as they do and her stomach touching the counter I was very close to leaving altogether. I have had an iced drink there a few times now and am just not impressed. Will not be returning
Fantastic experience at Coffee Republic! The coffee is always fresh and flavorful, and the cozy setting makes it a great place to relax or work.
If you're looking for high-quality coffee and a friendly atmosphere, Coffee Republic is the place to be. Their attention to detail in every cup makes it a standout spot

Coffee Republic in Matthews is a delight! The coffee is outstanding, and the environment is so welcoming. Perfect for a relaxing break or a productive work session. Highly recommend their specialty drinks
Love Coffee Republic! The atmosphere is perfect for catching up with friends or working. The coffee is rich and flavorful, and the staff goes above and beyond to ensure a great experience
Exceptional coffee and a warm, inviting atmosphere at Coffee Republic. The baristas are skilled, and the quality of the drinks is always consistent. A must-visit for any coffee lover

coffee was decent but desperately needs a new owner. had only one employee who had no clue what they were doing and clearly needed help. very unprofessional. obnoxious music playing and just not great atmosphere. so sad they replaced dilworth.

Spectacular coffee!
I got my usual latte and it was robust, bold and flavorful! I loved it!
I  was there in the afternoon, so their pastry selections were depleted, but I'd like to return and try a few of them!

The decor and feel is homey and unique.
There's quite a bit of bar style seating and a few tables- inside and out.

If you like good coffee- this is the place for you!
Great coffee shop!  The variety of products was amazing to see.  Good selection of breakfast treats and sweet treats.  Would highly recommend.
everything was great!! The whole experience was amazing
Good vibes and great coffee !
the best coffee shop ever!!
Great vibe, great service! Our community needed Coffee Republic! Welcome! The #Buzzers are amazballs!
Best Coffee I've ever had, so glad they're in the neighborhood!
Their coffee is meh, pretty generically bland.  Not as good as Dilworth Coffee.

Coffee tastes great but the service was really BAD.  The cashier seemed rude and did not ask which option of coffee I wanted. Really?  Also, the two co-workers argued over the dates of the food instead of working on our orders.
Nice employees.  Got an iced Calm Bean latte, with oat milk, vanilla, lavender.  It was just right for me.  Not too sweet, could taste the flavors nicely. Good coffee flavor too.
Such a cute shop!! All the barista are super friendly and awesome to chat with! 10/10 highly recommend the Salty Dog latte and those strawberry croissants
